data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Niger, Nigeria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niger, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,051,776 believers in Niger, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 4,082,600 people living in Niger through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,051,776 believers in Niger to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kami people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kami people.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Niger.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Niger who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Niger, Nigeria with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Niger
location.people_groups_list: Koro Nulu, Kakanda, Ura, Kambari, Kakihum
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koro Nulu (4,000), Kakanda (44,000), Ura (1,700), Kambari (158,000), Kakihum (26,000)
